short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: David See-Less blocks all David Seymour content from your browser for enjoyable reading again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
David See-Less is like an Ad Blocker, but only for parts of the web that mention David Seymour. 

Features:
- Supports blocking articles, images and paragraphs mentioning David Seymour.
- Contains custom rules for New Zealand news sites to browse without interruptions.
  -NZ Herald
  -Stuff
  -Newsroom
  -RNZ
  -The Spinoff
  -The Press
  -The Post
  -Otago Daily Times
  -Reddit
